answers.answer: I had my glucose test at 15wks and my tests came back perfectly fine and now my ob is making me take it again next Tuesday I'm 23 wks now but Tuesday I'll be 24wks. It's like she want me to be diabetic or have gestational diabetes, it's kinda nerves wrecking too. Ugh
You could've are something for those other 7 hrs before you took the drink.
the clinic told me i couldn't past 12 i wish i would have now i was starving lol.

Your not suppose to eat 8 hours prior to your test. I perform these everyday at my local hospital. It just gives alot more accurate results. But every practice has different rules to follow.As for the spewing during the test - do not think this means you have gestational diabetes. . Alot of women who have GD have no symptoms at all during the test.

question: so girls i did my glucose test today. it wasn't as bad. i have five minutes to drink it. i drank it and i felt fine. i didn't eat anything for 9 hours so i was surprised. my doctor saw me and said my baby was "loud in there" in my stomach? is that a bad thing? she said she kept kicking at the dopplar and moving and was like whoa you got an active baby. anyways so 20 minutes before the hour was up i threw it up! i threw up a lot too. I'm not sure if it was all of it but i threw up and i felt so much better after just a bit dizzy. they took the blood and i got dizzy again! i think its because i didn't eat at all. but that was it. do you guys think i passed? i hope i did.
title: about my appointment today
